holidays.title: National C60 Day
holidays.description: Scientists, nutritionists, doctors, and the alternative health community love the powerful antioxidant properties of Carbon 60.

holidays.title: Sukkot
holidays.description: A Jewish holiday also known as the Feast of Booths.

holidays.title: World Post Day
holidays.description: Throw back to communication methods of the past with some good old-fashioned letters.

holidays.title: CURIOUS EVENTS DAY
holidays.description: It's the day to wonder about everything we’ve ever wondered about.

holidays.title: Independence of Guayaquil
holidays.description: Explore the fascinating history behind the revolution that led to the independence of Guayaquil.

holidays.title: International Beer and Pizza Day
holidays.description: We take you on an informative adventure of one of the greatest food pairings in history.

holidays.title: Leif Erikson Day
holidays.description: We remember the explorer credited with bringing the first Nordic people to America.

holidays.title: National Digitool Day
holidays.description: Celebrate the day by participating in ballooning events and make sure you install the DBI3 model.

holidays.title: National Moldy Cheese Day
holidays.description: Get ready to treat yourself to some spectacular gastronomic delights.

holidays.title: National Pro-Life Cupcake Day
holidays.description: This day was initiated by Cupcakes for Life to raise awareness about abortion.

holidays.title: Pastor Appreciation Day
holidays.description: On this day, devotees come together to express gratitude to pastors and other staff of the church.

holidays.title: Saint Barthélemy: Abolition Day
holidays.description: Join the people of Saint Barthélemy as they reflect on their past and celebrate their freedom.

holidays.title: South Korea Hangul Day
holidays.description: Join in with the South Korean natives in celebration of the alphabet in their language.

holidays.title: Uganda Independence Day
holidays.description: Explore the exciting details about Uganda Independence Day and its significance to the nation’s citizens.

holidays.title: Valmiki Jayanti
holidays.description: Soak yourself in devotion while celebrating the birth of the great sage Valmiki.

holidays.title: Vap Full Moon Poya
holidays.description: Vap Full Moon Poya honors the Buddhist fasting month’s completion and Buddha’s sermon in Tavatimsa.

holidays.title: White Sunday
holidays.description: Discover the essence of White Sunday and why it's an increasingly popular holiday in the Americas.

holidays.title: World Hospice and Palliative Care Day
holidays.description: It started as a single concert titled "Come and Sing" and become a worldwide event.

holidays.title: Bella Hadid’s Birthday
holidays.description: Want to know all about supermodel Bella Hadid? We have the scoop!

holidays.title: Cody Jones’s Birthday
holidays.description: This skillful YouTuber has become widely known for being one of the members of Dude Perfect.

holidays.title: Eddie Guerrero’s Birthday
holidays.description: This legendary wrestler was well-known for his magnetic personality and wrestling capabilities.

holidays.title: Jackson Browne’s Birthday
holidays.description: This exceptional musician, songwriter, and activist has sold over 18 million records in the United States.

holidays.title: John Lennon’s Birthday
holidays.description: Who doesn't love John Lennon? Let's get a closer look into his life.

holidays.title: Lecrae Moore’s Birthday
holidays.description: This Grammy award-winning rapper might’ve started as a rebel; he has however risen to the top!

holidays.title: Scotty McCreery’s Birthday
holidays.description: Winning is in this talented country musician’s legacy, and nothing can stop him.

holidays.title: Sean Lennon’s Birthday
holidays.description: This gifted musician has been making music since 1987 and has become well known for it.

holidays.title: Sharon Osbourne’s Birthday
holidays.description: This straight-taking star rose to fame for her appearances on popular reality television shows.

holidays.title: Zachery Ty Bryan’s Birthday
holidays.description: This funny actor is best known for playing Brad in the T.V. series “Home Improvement.”
